name: Patricia FERST, Petitioner, v. Conrad T. FRAIDER, D.O., and Suburban General Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents

parties: Patricia FERST, Petitioner, v. Conrad T. FRAIDER, D.O., and Suburban General Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 29th day of October, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. This matter is REMANDED to the trial court for further proceedings in accordance with this Court’s recent decision in Cheeseman v. Lethal Exterminator, Inc., 549 Pa. 200, 701 A.2d 156 (1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jeffrey S. Kahn, Plymouth Mtg., for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
702 A.2d 361
Patricia FERST, Petitioner, v. Conrad T. FRAIDER, D.O., and Suburban General Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 29, 1997.
Jeffrey S. Kahn, Plymouth Mtg., for petitioner.
